hero.subtitle: Turn Your Repetitive Work Into Smart, Self-Running Systems

aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.description: We are a team of AI experts dedicated to transforming businesses through intelligent automation. Our mission is to help companies eliminate repetitive tasks and unlock their full potential with cutting-edge AI solutions.

aiVoiceAgent.heading: AI Voice Agent, for sales and customer support
aiVoiceAgent.description: A platform to create, link and customize sales and marketing agents that are able to do inbound and outbound calls. The agent can be linked to the company data and evaluate how satisfied the customer is.
aiVoiceAgent.featureText: Always available to drive your sales

postGeneration.heading: Automate your Post generation
postGeneration.description: A platform where you upload your clients data for context, let the agents search your market and competitors and create your weekly posts.
postGeneration.featureText: Faster content generation for your business

webAutomation.heading: Web Automation with
webAutomation.description: A web Automation Solution that runs a browser in the backend to automate any task from any platform eg, WhatsApp, web scraping etc ...
webAutomation.featureText: Always available to drive your sales

services.heading: Deliver a high-quality
services.description: Connect AI agents with your business tools to automate repetitive tasks, eliminate busywork

services.title: AI Development
services.description: Build custom AI agents tailored to your business needs. From voice agents for sales and customer support to intelligent chatbots that understand your domain, we create AI solutions that integrate seamlessly with your existing systems.

services.title: Agentic Systems
services.description: Design and deploy multi-agent systems where AI agents collaborate to solve complex business problems. Our agentic architectures enable intelligent workflows that can reason, plan, and execute tasks autonomously across your organization.

services.title: AI Automation
services.description: Transform repetitive business processes into intelligent, self-running systems. Our AI automation solutions eliminate manual work, reduce errors, and free your team to focus on high-value strategic initiatives.

services.title: Web Automation
services.description: Automate web-based tasks with our Chromium-powered solutions. From data scraping and form filling to social media management and multi-platform workflows, we handle complex browser automation that works reliably at scale.

services.title: LangGraph Apps
services.description: Build sophisticated AI applications using LangGraph's state machine architecture. Create complex agent workflows with decision trees, loops, and conditional logic that can handle intricate business processes and multi-step operations.

useCases.heading: Use cases
useCases.subtext: Explore how our AI solutions can transform your business operations

workingProcess.heading: Our Working
workingProcess.description: Connect AI agents with your business tools to automate repetitive tasks, eliminate busywork, and free your team to focus on growth.

steps.title: Requirement Gathering
steps.description: We analyze your business needs, identify bottlenecks, and define clear automation goals.

steps.title: Planning and Design
steps.description: We architect a tailored AI solution, designing workflows and selecting the best tools for your stack.

steps.title: Implementation / Development
steps.description: We build and integrate custom AI agents to ensure seamless connectivity with your systems.

steps.title: Testing & Refinement
steps.description: Rigorous testing ensures accuracy and efficiency, with iterative refinement for optimal performance.

steps.title: Deployment & Support
steps.description: We deploy the solution and provide ongoing support to ensure sustained value and adaptability.

questions.question: How can I check the progress of the work?
questions.answer: Don't worry, we got you covered. You will have FREE Backend, Frontend and database host. When our system update you with changes, you can view them immediately from the website.

questions.question: How about maintenance?
questions.answer: We provide ongoing maintenance packages to ensure your AI agents and automations continue to perform optimally as your business evolves.

questions.question: Do you have prove of concept?
questions.answer: Yes, we can develop a Proof of Concept (POC) to demonstrate the value and feasibility of the proposed solution before full-scale implementation.

questions.question: How secure is IntellAgent?
questions.answer: Security is our top priority. We use industry-standard encryption and follow best practices to ensure your data and your clients' data remain safe and confidential.

questions.question: What makes you different from other providers?
questions.answer: We focus on creating tailored, fully integrated systems rather than just standalone chatbots. Our solutions are designed to automate entire workflows, not just answer questions.

questions.question: Where does my company need to be based?
questions.answer: We operate globally! Since our solutions are cloud-based, we can work with companies located anywhere in the world.

footer.slogan: Relax, we get you and we've got you.
